text: People sleep peaceably in their beds at night only because rough men stand ready to do violence on their behalf.
author: George Orwell

text: Just as a candle cannot burn without fire, men cannot live without a spiritual life.
author: Buddha

text: Do not pray for easy lives. Pray to be stronger men.
author: John F. Kennedy

text: Wise men speak because they have something to say Fools because they have to say something.
author: Plato

text: It is wonderful how much time good people spend fighting the devil. If they would only expend the same amount of energy loving their fellow men, the devil would die in his own tracks of ennui.
author: Helen Keller
